_description: Seven rhyming lines on the Properties of a Horse

BlCottGalEIX.Transcription:
heded os an oxTayled as foxcomly as a kyngNekked as a
                    dukyngmouthed as a kliketwitted a wodkokwylled as a weder
                    coke
BlCottGalEIX.Note:
Added by a later hand to originally blank leaves at end of a
                    volume.
